column4: Hey guys, I'm running Ubuntu Intrepid. I wanted to run Windows XP through a virtual machine, and also possibly test out some other distros. My quextion is, what is the best way to do this on Intrepid?
sudo apt-get install virtualbox (on intrepid this will work?)
yes, the package name is virtualbox-ose .. but maybe you prefer the new 2.0 version.. (not in repo)
